Token.description: API token used to access Fastly

FormatVersion.description: The version of the custom logging format used for the configured endpoint.

Name.description: The name for the real-time logging configuration.

Placement.description: Where in the generated VCL the logging call should be placed.

RequestMaxBytes.description: The maximum number of bytes sent in one request. Defaults 0 for unbounded. [Default 0]

RequestMaxEntries.description: The maximum number of logs sent in one request. Defaults 0 for unbounded. [Default 0]

ResponseCondition.description: The name of an existing condition in the configured endpoint, or leave blank to always execute.

TlsCaCert.description: A secure certificate to authenticate a server with. Must be in PEM format.

TlsClientCert.description: The client certificate used to make authenticated requests. Must be in PEM format.

TlsClientKey.description: The client private key used to make authenticated requests. Must be in PEM format.

TlsHostname.description: The hostname to verify the server's certificate. This should be one of the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) fields for the certificate. Common Names (CN) are not supported.

Token.description: A Splunk token for use in posting logs over HTTP to your collector.

Url.description: The URL to post logs to.

CreatedAt.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format. Read-only.

DeletedAt.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format. Read-only.

ServiceId.description: Alphanumeric string identifying the service. Read-only.

UpdatedAt.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format. Read-only.

Version.description: Integer identifying a backend version. Read-only.
